root.name: Haunt the House: Terrortown
root.description: OverviewHaunt the House: Terrortown is an action puzzle game by SFB Games for PlayStation Mobile. It casts the player as a ghost trying to rid the town he haunts of humans by possessing various objects to frighten them into leaving. The game is an significantly expanded remake of the free 2010 flash game Haunt the House, adding more buildings with different environments and interactions.
